name: Snaketris
description:
Experience a new way to play classic arcades! Grab a friend, choose between a python and a brick, and fill the lines together. Assist each other to beat the high score, obstruct and destroy just because it's fun or just play your games separately on different sides of a field. Or be the most hardcore player and play solo!

Controls are simple: arrow keys for Snake, WASD for Block, escape to pause. You can also use RMB to toggle a fullscreen mode.

How many points can you score?
